job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Schrdingers mission is to revolutionize drug discovery through the use of breakthrough computational methods We are currently looking for outstanding individuals to join our drug discovery group and contribute to our rapidly expanding portfolio of drug discovery collaborationsbrbrOur drug discovery group of around 60 scientists includes designers modelers computational chemists medicinal chemists crystallographers biochemists and biologists The group is supported by more than 100 software developers and engineers Three of the programs weve worked on in the past 7 years have progressed into the clinic and an additional one is expected to enter clinical trials this year For recent news on one of these programs go to this websitebrbrIf you are interested in a career combining science and technology on drug discovery projects we are eager to hear from youbrbrstronguJob RequirementsbrustrongulliParticipate in drug discovery group projectsliliResearch curate and prepare computational chemistry data sets includingliliSearch scientific journals patents and databases for potential data sourcesliliTransfer data from source to computer files or database systems including the 2D rendering of chemical matterliliVerify data by comparing it to source documents and update existing dataliliPrepare and maintain drug discovery group chemical database contentliliQuerying exporting and uploading data and structuresliliRetrieve data from the database or electronic files as requestedliliParticipate in improving software and processes via early access usage bug reporting and outlining improvement requestsbrliulstronguEssential Qualifications And ExperiencebrustrongulliBachelors degree in chemistry biology or biochemistry liliSuccessful completion of at least one year of organic chemistry courseworkliliFamiliarity with twodimensional chemical structure representations especially depictions of stereochemistryliliApproach research in an organized fashion with a strong attention to detailliliPractical experience with tabular data in common spreadsheet formats eg MS Excel Google Sheets commaseparated or tabseparated valuesliliMotivated learner willing to take on new challengesliliAdapts quickly to changing situations methods and proceduresbrliulstronguDesirable SkillsbrustrongulliExperience with analyzing scientific journal articlesliliExperience with any of the followingliliSpreadsheets MS Excel Google Sheets CSVliliOnline sources of scientific information especially NCBI PubMed RCSB PDB UniProtKB EMBLEBI ChEMBL CAS SciFinder Elsevier ReaxysliliUnix andor LinuxliliScripting shell Python PerlliliVersion control GitliliResearch experience in chemistry or biologybrliulstronguPay And PerksbrbrustrongSchrdinger understands its people that make a company great Because of this were prepared to offer a competitive salary stock options and a wide range of benefits that include healthcare with dental and vision a 401k pretax commuter benefits a flexible work schedule and a parental leave program We have catered meals in the office every day a company culture that is relaxed but engaged and over a month of paid vacation time Our Administrative and Human Resources departments also plan a myriad of fun companywide eventsbrbrWeve been working remotely from across the world over the past few months because the health and safety of our employees is paramount Nonetheless we have kept Schrdingers outstanding culture going through a series of online fitness classes trivia nights happy hours and so much morebrbrSound exciting Apply today and join usbrbremAs an equal opportunity employer Schrdinger hires outstanding individuals into every position in the company People who work with us have a high degree of engagement a commitment to working effectively in teams and a passion for the companys mission We place the highest value on creating a safe environment where our employees can grow and contribute and refuse to discriminate on the basis of race color religious belief sex age disability national origin alienage or citizenship status marital status partnership status caregiver status sexual and reproductive health decisions gender identity or expression or sexual orientation To us diversity isnt just a buzzword but an important element of our core principles and key business practices We believe that diverse companies innovate better and think more creatively than homogenous ones because they take into account a wide range of viewpoints For us greater diversity doesnt mean better headlines or public images  it means increased adaptability and profitabilityem
